skills.name: CHAOS
desc: • Deals physical damage to a single target.
• 50% Chance to Lower Defense, Permadeath, and Ignite targets for 2 turns.
• Deals 3 hits of Additional Physical Damage if you have the Armor Penetration buff active.

skills.name: SCORCHED EARTH
desc: • Inflicts 3 Toxic Burns on all enemies for 2 turns.
• Heal all allies based on your MAX HP.
• Grants Increased Fury Generation to allies for 2 turns.

skills.name: INTIMIDATE
desc: Reduce the Max HP of all enemies by 20% at the start of the battle
